review: Love this game so far, can't wait to see what future updates bring. Really enjoy the freedom and survival aspects.Would recommend to anyone who likes sand-box type games :)

review: I'll be honest, I haven't played any other Telltale game, only seen others play them. But, I do think this is a great game (at least the 1st episode was) and the gameplay is a well done, in my humble opinion. I am loving the story and can't wait to play the later episodes and recommend that you give it a try if you like Minecraft and Telltale's other games. It even runs well on my poor excuse of a PC :D
